name: UNDERSWAP: Love Struck (unofficial remake)
description:
Welcome to the unofficial page of UNDERSWAP: Love Struck

Current version only have sans battle other character (papyrus) will be added soon

Controls
  • Arrow key - move
  • Z - select
  • X - skip dialog/lower soul speed
Most of the asset below to Arii (treo) and others who helped with the sprites.

This game is also on gamejolt (https://gamejolt.com/games/LS-remake/628860)

do I have to say more?

No.
